metadata.title: CVE-2018-7689 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Lack of permission checks in the InitializeDevelPackage function inopenSUSE Open Build Service before 2.9.3 allowed authenticated users tomodify packages where they do not have write permissions.

criterions.comment: open-build-service: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
